betterquesting:10.desc:8: Once you have unlocked the Chemistry research, you will be able to access the Chemistry chapter. \n\nAfter you have unlocked the "Charge Base" research in Occultism, you can craft a Bone Bow. \The Bone Bow can consume its internal energizer to fire arrows twice as fast as the regular speed, which can easily kill all kinds of monsters, and can even take away an Outlander Evil Guard with three arrows after enchantment, which is very scary, so it is recommended to make one as soon as possible if you have the conditions.
